interiorStructure: Metallic core, silicate mantle, and solid crust
summary: There are signs of liquid water on Mars!
Mars has the largest dust storms in our whole solar system!
Mars has the tallest mountain known in our solar system, called Olympus Mons and is 21 km high!
While there once was plate tectonics on Mars, today, there is no longer any movements of Mars' plates!
Mars is a cold desert, with an average temperature of -81 degrees Fahrenheit!
